contentrichtext.text: '''Hochelaga—Maisonneuve''' (formerly known as '''Maisonneuve''') was a federal [[electoral district (Canada)|electoral district]] in [[Quebec]], [[Canada]], that was represented in the [[Canadian House of Commons]] from 1979 to 2004. It was created in 1976 as "Maisonneuve" riding from parts of [[Hochelaga (electoral district)|Hochelaga]], [[Lafontaine (electoral district)|Lafontaine]] and [[Maisonneuve—Rosemont]] [[electoral district (Canada)|ridings]]. It was renamed "Hochelaga—Maisonneuve" in 1978. The riding was abolished in 2003 when it was redistributed into Hochelaga, [[Honoré-Mercier (electoral district)|Honoré-Mercier]] and [[La Pointe-de-l'Île (electoral district)|La Pointe-de-l'Île]] ridings. ==Members of Parliament== This riding elected the following [[Member of Parliament|Members of Parliament]]: # [[Serge Joyal]], [[Liberal Party of Canada|Liberal]] (1979–1988) # [[Allan
